name: Bloody Shooter
description:
It's in your blood! You are a lymphocyte defending the red blood cells from invading bacteria and viruses. 

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • Click anywhere to shoot.
  • Or use a gamepad like a good soldier!

This title is in BETA:

Coming changes:

  • Longer music track
  • More sound effects
  • Final balancing
  • More score-related feedback
  • Tweaks here and there
